data.text:
@DeborahCSawyer @PBethlenfalvy @CFIB This is a very good question. Where is the rebate money
And where is the $10,000🤣
Why is there a 45 to 90 day delay for rent subsidy just to file an inquiry.
What say you@cfib?
@PBethlenfalvy Who is seeing the money? What are you doing for those of us in poverty, on ODSP and who can’t work?
@michele78897868 @PBethlenfalvy What mandates are left you clown? Masks? Grow up.
@PBethlenfalvy Don’t talk to me unless your ending Mandates.  Our freedom is PRECIOUS it can’t be bought

@PBethlenfalvy @CFIB But has anyone got their hands on the cash? We've been approved for the prop. tax rebate but the hoops to jump through, just to "update" our banking info - which we've then been told doesn't need updating - are horrendous.  I'm convinced the computers are programmed to do this.
